Love's pedigree, or, A discourse shewing the grace of love in a believer to be of a divine original delivered in a sermon preached at a lecture in Boston, Febr. 29 1699/1700 / by S. Willard ... Willard, Samuel, 1640-1707.
28 p.
Printed by B. Green and J. Allen, sold by Benjamin Eliot ..., Boston in N.E. : 1700.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Union theological Seminary Library.
